name: The Bug Which Made the Bugs
name_original: The Bug Which Made the Bugs
description:
This is a game made for the Wowie Jam 2.0! The theme for this jam was, "Intentional Bugs". My idea was to mix an actual computer bug with a play-on-words of "bug".

After a computer glitch throws you into the world of bugs, you must survive using your own two--bug spray cans. 

This is only my second game jam, and I am still fairly new to game development. My previous jam was for Ludum Dare 45. With a limited time frame, my game happens to have a couple bugs, however, they are unfortunately not intentional. I will try to further improve my skills, but for now, enjoy this game!
